snippet: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is showing a willingness to challenge some of the pillars of Japan’s establishment and sail “the rough seas of global competition.”
abstract: Japanese Prime Min Shinzo Abe is showing an increasing willingness to take on pillars of his country's establishment in aggressive attempt to breathe life into economy; recent moves, including appointment of new central bank head and gestures toward fresh Pacific free-trade pact, have drawn public support.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is showing a willingness to challenge some of the pillars of Japan’s establishment and sail “the rough seas of global competition.”

headline.seo: Shinzo Abe Shakes Up Japan in Effort to Stir Its Economy
headline.main: Japan’s New Leader Takes On Old Order to Jolt Economy
headline.print_headline: Japan’s New Leader Dares to Challenge Old Order in Bid to Energize Economy
